Name: 27 Pages
About the game: For each level that is passed, a new page of the diary is unlocked. Revealing a new piece of a bizarre and mysterious story. ~27 colorfull levels with a dynamic color change system ~Tight controls with a simple walljump mechanic ~A challenging game that will require a lot of skill and timing of the player ~Short and simple game to have a simple fun moment. Hope you like my first game on Steam. Have a good game.
